definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once

sentences.english: With all the variety and adventure, Able Seaman Green said she enjoyed her work.
sentences.chinese: 面對變化和冒險，二等兵格林說她非常喜歡她的工作。

sentences.english: Being a woman is synonymous with being a second-class citizen, in her opinion.
sentences.chinese: 在她看來，做女人是做二等公民的同義詞。

sentences.english: He is forced to ride in a second-class cabin because the train is unusually full.
sentences.chinese: 他被迫乘坐二等艙，因爲火車是非常充分。

sentences.english: Fourpence was a private soldier's daily pay at that time.
sentences.chinese: 當時二等兵每天的工資是四便士。

sentences.english: Wing section and survival rates as second-class cabin seats 56%.
sentences.chinese: 機翼段和二等艙段座位的生還率同爲56%。

sentences.english: Give me two first-class retum tickets to Hastings, please.
sentences.chinese: 請給我一張週末回程的二等來回票。

sentences.english: Passengers traveling on the line pay 555 yuan for a one-way, economy-class ticket between Beijing and Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 京滬高鐵單程二等座的票價爲555元。

sentences.english: This fellow is traveling in a first-class compartment on a second-class ticket.
sentences.chinese: 這個傢伙竟然拿着二等車廂的票坐一等車廂。

sentences.english: I got a second-class ticket on the train to New York.
sentences.chinese: 我弄到一張去紐約的二等艙火車票。

sentences.english: Won the second-class prize in the university drawing contest in2013.
sentences.chinese: 2013年在本校繪畫比賽中獲二等獎。

sentences.english: Do you have two Second Class cabins available on the date I mentioned?
sentences.chinese: 你有兩張我提到的那個日子的二等艙票嗎？

sentences.english: I want to reserve a berth of second class cabin.
sentences.chinese: 我想預計一張二等艙的臥鋪票。

sentences.english: I got a second-class ticket on the train to Paris.
sentences.chinese: 我有張去巴黎的二等火車票。

sentences.english: Two of my books respectively won the first-class reward and the second-class reward of national excellent books.
sentences.chinese: 我的兩本書分別榮獲全國優秀圖書一等獎和二等獎。

sentences.english: Send it second- class if it is not urgent.
sentences.chinese: 如不急的話，就按二等郵件寄。

sentences.english: Two one way. tickets to Winchester tomorrow, please.
sentences.chinese: 請買三張去青島的二等單程票。

definition: to wait to fill a vacancy/reserve (candidate)/alternate/substitute
superb/first-rate/(of officials in imperial times) the highest rank
military officer/ranked officer in Chinese army, divided into 大校, 上校, 中校, 少校
